mapper.select:
select count(i.id) from t_mall_integral i left join t_mall_product p on p.id= i.product_id and p.is_delete=0 where i.is_delete = 0 and p.is_delete=0 and p.is_publish=1 and p.check_status=1
and i.start_time > now() and i.end_time > now() and i.is_use=1
and i.start_time <= now() and now() < i.end_time and i.is_use=1
and i.start_time < now() and i.end_time <= now() and i.is_use=1
and i.is_use= -1
and
i.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and i.shop_id=#{shopId }

SELECT i.id, i.product_id as productId, i.money, i.start_time as startTime, i.end_time as endTime, i.type, i.user_id as userId, i.shop_id as shopId, i.create_time as createTime, i.is_delete as isDelete, i.is_use as isUse, c.image_url AS imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url AS specImageUrl,p.is_specifica AS isSpecifica,p.pro_name AS proName ,IF(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) AS proPrice ,p.pro_stock_total as proStockTotal FROM t_mall_integral i LEFT JOIN t_mall_product p ON i.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url FROM t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON i.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory WHERE is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON i.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id WHERE i.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id FROM t_mall_integral p LEFT JOIN t_mall_store s ON p.shop_id = s.id WHERE s.is_delete=0 AND p.is_delete=0 AND p.is_use=1 AND p.start_time <= NOW() AND NOW() < p.end_time AND s.wx_shop_id=#{wxShopId}
